West_Allis.WSSP:
WSSP (1250 AM) is a Milwaukee-based sports talk station owned by Entercom. Its studios and transmitter are co-located in Hales Corners.
The station is the secondary home station for any play-by-play sports coverage on WTMJ 620 which conflicts with another event; for instance the Milwaukee Bucks air on WSSP if a Milwaukee Brewers game airs.
